title: MLOps
content:
ML Lifecycle Management

  • Experiment Tracking: Versioning models and datasets
  • Feature Stores: Managing and serving features
  • Model Registry: Cataloging and deploying models

Infrastructure

  • Compute Resources: GPU/TPU management
  • Distributed Training: Scaling to multiple nodes
  • Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes for ML

Best Practices

Approaches for translating the algorithms from your paper collection into reliable production systems.
